article_title: Germany’s Euroskeptical, Anti-Immigration AfD Party Looks Set to Win Seats in Bremen
article_text:
BERLIN—Germany’s euroskeptical and anti-immigration Alternative fuer Deutschland party Sunday appeared set to win seats in a fifth consecutive state parliament, signaling that the party might become a more permanent force and center-right rival to Chancellor Angela Merkel’s conservative party.

The party gained 5% of the votes cast in the city-state parliament elections in Bremen, appearing to squeak to the 5% minimum threshold to win...
